word:
THIS LETTER HAS SOME OF THE STERNEST 
     WARNINGS AND COUNSELS FROM THE LORD'S 
     PROPHET FOUND IN THIS BOOK. IT SEEMS THAT 
     ELIZABETH HAS SO MANY PERSONAL PROBLEMS 
     AND WEAKNESSES THAT HER CASE IS HOPELESS. 
     THIS LETTER AT FIRST SOUNDS LIKE IT COULD BE 
     CONSIDERED A FINAL JUDGMENT FROM GOD, 
     BUT RIGHT IN THE MIDDLE OF ALL THE REBUKE ARE 
     THE FOLLOWING WORDS OF ENCOURAGEMENT;
